alert.note: Alert for Burney Basin, Eastern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 07 at 2:34AM PST until December 07 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to 6 inches. Snow levels around 4000 feet today. Winds gusting up to 45 mph over higher terrain. * WHERE...Eastern Shasta mountains. * WHEN...Through 10 PM PST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for reduced visibilities at times with gusty winds.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
